Commentary: shortish and outside off, chopped straight to backward point off the back foot
Commentary_short: de Silva to Ahmed Shehzad, no run

Commentary: looped up on middle, Shehzad ventures down the track again, gets close enough to the pitch and lofts a six down the ground
Commentary_short: de Silva to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX runs

Commentary: Shehzad ventures down the track again only to have his stumps rattled. Big-turning wrong'un from Hasaranga, Shehzad leaves his crease, he is nowhere close to the pitch of this ball. It dips, turns, and disturbs the furniture. Wild leg-side heave from Shehzad
Commentary_short: de Silva to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT
Dismissal_text: Ahmed Shehzad  b de Silva 13 (16b 0x4 1x6) SR: 81.25

Commentary: Umar out. Another wrong'un from Hasaranga, fizzes back in, rushes the batsman for pace. He is late to jab his bat down. Pad first I reckon. Yes, hits the flap of the back pad in line with middle. Back-to-back golden ducks for Umar. He reviews the on-field out decision in vain
Commentary_short: de Silva to Umar Akmal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Umar Akmal lbw b de Silva 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: dragged down on middle, pulled to deep midwicket. Ali averts the hat-trick
Commentary_short: de Silva to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: Three wickets in four balls for Hasranga! He wheels away. Catch him if you can. Another wrong'un, turns back in once again, a crease-bound Sarfraz chops and misses. Timber. Game-changing over from Hasaranga
Commentary_short: de Silva to Sarfaraz Ahmed, OUT
Dismissal_text: Sarfaraz Ahmed  b de Silva 26 (16b 3x4 1x6) SR: 162.50

Commentary: clipped off the pads through square leg
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: speared down leg for a wide
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 wide

Commentary: wrong'un, heading down leg for another wide
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 wide

Commentary: tossed up on middle, dead-batted away
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: skids on outside off, hit down to long-off
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: liberally tossed up on middle, played back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: attempted wrong'un, dragged down outside off and spins away further, off-side wide
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, 1 wide

Commentary: short, wide, another googly rocks back and cracks a cut behind point for four
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, FOUR runs

Commentary: stock ball on off, pushed back to Sandakan
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: flighted on middle, knocked into the leg side. Pakistan go for a kamikaze single, the keeper tracks down the ball but misses the stumps. A direct hit could have had Asif
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: hacked down to long-on off the inside half
Commentary_short: de Silva to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: pushed through outside off, stabbed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: full and spins back in, defended back to Hasaranga
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: short and slides on outside off, Imad goes deep in the crease and chops it away fine of backward point for four
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: wrong'un, short wide, cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: fuller and wider outside off, lets it go through to the keeper
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 wide

Commentary: short of length outside off, punches it towards long-off
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, goes back and pushes it back towards the bowler
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: length ball outside off, skips down the track and flicks it towards long-on
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: fuller outside off, smashed past the diving cover fielder but deep extra cover moves across swiftly to cut it off
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 2 runs

Commentary: fuller around off, tonked down the ground, one bounce and over the boundary line
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower in the air, length ball around middle, Imad was looking to work it on the leg side, closes the face of the bat a touch early and gets a thick outside edge towards third man
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: length ball outside off, punched towards deep extra cover from the back foot
Commentary_short: de Silva to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps and hammered over the bowler's head once more. Long-on puts in a desperate slide but cannot get to it
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller and wider outside off this time, Imad goes aerial once again, neat connection but one-bounce to long-off
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, goes back and forces it towards long-on, a bit of fumble but no damage
Commentary_short: de Silva to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up fuller and wider outside off and Imad has drilled it through extra cover, long-off had no chance
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball around off, punched towards extra cover from the back foot
Commentary_short: de Silva to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket to hand back the strike to Imad
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: down the ground but gets too close to the pitch of the ball, pushes it towards short midwicket, the bowler does the fielding himself
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket, Sandakan once again with the chase but cannot stop the second run this time
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 2 runs

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, slogs it wide of long-on, didn't look like he timed it that well, inside half of the bat. The call is for two but it keeps racing and beats the long-on's slide
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, flicked in front of square leg
Commentary_short: Sandakan to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
Commentary_short: Udana to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: fuller outside off, lofts it over mid-off to take Pakistan past 100, this partnership is worth 51 in just 32 balls
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller around off, looks to go aerial down the ground, the ball takes the outer half and but falls in the no man's land, well short of deep extra cover, Asif comes back for the second, the keeper collects the throw and whips off the bails. Asif puts in the dive to make his ground. An easy one for third umpire
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, 2 runs

Commentary: fuller but way too outside off, one more to the total
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, 1 wide

Commentary: a wide yorker, around sixth stump, Asif Ali moves across a bit, jams his bat but cannot connect
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: fuller outside off and driven firmly through covers, Hasaranga puts in full-length slide to make a brilliant stop to his right
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, 2 runs

Commentary: a full toss around off, driven towards long-off where the fielder takes it too casual and ends up fumbling, the batsmen are aware to sneak in a second run
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, 2 runs

Commentary: slower one down the leg side, Imad moves across to scoop but fails to get bat on it
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: fuller outside off, smashed towards extra cover but a brilliant stop by Shanaka, diving forward
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Imad Wasim, no run

Commentary: another slower one, Imad picks it up this time and smashes between the bowler and mid-off, gets another boundary
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller again, almost a yorker, pushes it towards the left of mid-off
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: a high full toss on the pads, Asif Ali, deep in the crease, though misses out on the pull, gets a leg bye to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Asif Ali, 1 leg bye

Commentary: Imad shows his card by moving away towards the leg side early, Rajitha slips in a full toss at the batsman, pulled firmly but straight towards deep-backward square leg
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside off, slower one, Imad goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Udana to Imad Wasim, 1 run

Commentary: outside off but almost in the blockhole, digs it out towards long-off
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on the stumps, Imad moves towards the off side and helps it over short fine leg, one-bounce four
Commentary_short: Udana to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: length outside off, moves across once again, goes down on one knee and swipes it past square leg for another boundary
Commentary_short: Udana to Imad Wasim, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller around off, Imad looks to repeat the shot but misses and is hit on the leg. An appeal for lbw and up goes the finger. Would have gone on to crashed into off and middle
Commentary_short: Udana to Imad Wasim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Imad Wasim lbw b Udana 47 (29b 8x4 0x6) SR: 162.06

Commentary: yorker length outside off, Wahab looks to dig out but fails
Commentary_short: Udana to Wahab Riaz, no run

Commentary: a brilliant yorker on the leg stump, digs it out towards long-on
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: another yorker, this is brilliant from Pradeep. Wahab can only work it towards long-on
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Wahab Riaz, 1 run

Commentary: that's three in three, Asif Ali goes deep inside his crease, his back foot very close to the stumps but can only manage a single to long-on
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Asif Ali, 1 run

Commentary: misses his length this time, ends up bowling a knee-high full toss on the stumps and Wahab scoops it over short third man
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Wahab Riaz, FOUR runs

Commentary: a low full toss this time, bunted towards deep midwicket, Asif Ali is charging back for the second and makes with a dive
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Wahab Riaz, 2 runs

Commentary: back-of-the-hand slower one this time, Wahab looks to scoop it over short fine leg, the idea is fine but fails in the execution and the keeper pedals back to take it comfortably
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Wahab Riaz, OUT
Dismissal_text: Wahab Riaz c †Bhanuka b Pradeep 7 (5b 1x4 0x6) SR: 140.00

Commentary: fuller outside off, Shadab looks to go aerial down the ground, gets it from the outer half and an easy catch to Shanaka at extra cover
Commentary_short: Udana to Shadab Khan, OUT
Dismissal_text: Shadab Khan c Shanaka b Udana 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: a slower one at the stumps, Asif Ali moves across and scoop, just evades Rajitha's jump at short fine leg
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, FOUR runs

Commentary: a high full toss outside off, Asif Ali looks to pull but misses out. The square leg umpire says the height was okay but that could have gone either way
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: fuller around off, looks to scoop again but misses, gets a leg bye to square leg
Commentary_short: Udana to Asif Ali, 1 leg bye

Commentary: and he has smashed it through covers for four. Fuller outside off and Amir throws everything at it, beats the man in the deep
Commentary_short: Udana to Mohammad Amir, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller again but slower this time, drills straight to Shanaka at extra cover
Commentary_short: Udana to Mohammad Amir, no run

Commentary: a low full toss angling on to the pads, misses the flick and is hit on the pads
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, driven along the ground towards long-on
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Asif Ali, no run

Commentary: a slower one, looks to smash it towards deep midwicket, but it's too full for the pull, Asif Ali misses and the off stump is pegged back
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Asif Ali, OUT

Commentary: fuller around off, looks to smash it away, gets an inside edge towards fine leg, a diving stop there keeps it to one
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mohammad Hasnain, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on the off stumps, Amir swings it towards deep midwicket, only a single
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mohammad Amir, 1 run

Commentary: that's the match, and the series for Sri Lanka.. A length again, backs away and lofts it towards long-on, doesn't get the required distance and fittingly it's Hasaranga who completes an easy catch
Commentary_short: Pradeep to Mohammad Hasnain, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Hasnain c de Silva b Pradeep 1 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00
